ProjectFunding.InternalFunding: The project has received initial internal funding from the founding partners, covering early-stage development, legal structuring, and prototype design. Additionally, part of operational revenues has been allocated to sustain ongoing activities.
ProjectFunding.ExternalCoFinancing: The initiative has benefited from strategic partnerships with investors/accelerators, which contributed financial resources or in-kind support, such as advisory services and technological infrastructure.
ProjectFunding.Conclusion: These combined efforts ensured the initial implementation and provided a solid foundation for growth. The requested funding will further expand technological development, market reach, and sustainability.
